channel.title: Sb508 map help
channel.description: i was wondering if you guys could tell me if it's possible to like grab a 317 client wich has all 508 maps? and use them ? cuz all 508's dosent have all mapdata's? if it is possible? how ? and would you like to help me :)?

item.title: Sb508 map help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you have a 317 client loading 508… You don’t need to transfer anything…

Read full topic

item.title: Sb508 map help
item.dc:creator: @vividnemesis vividnemesis
item.description:
@vividnemesis wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:530968”]Yes, it’s completely possible.
There’s 2 ways you can do this:

  1. Search for a 317 client with 508+ maps and data already loaded.

  2. Get a 317 deob, or just about any 317 client (deobs have little to no shit packed in em) and manually add it using one of the many tutorials.

Also, this would be in client help.[/quote]
i am sorry for putting this post in the wrong section, but what if i got the 317 loading 508? what files do i gotta transfer and to where :D?

Read full topic

item.title: Sb508 map help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Yes, it’s completely possible.
There’s 2 ways you can do this:

  1. Search for a 317 client with 508+ maps and data already loaded.

  2. Get a 317 deob, or just about any 317 client (deobs have little to no shit packed in em) and manually add it using one of the many tutorials.

Also, this would be in client help.

Read full topic
